QuestData.Title: Cruelty of the Kvaldir
QuestData.Description: I thank you for saving me, $n. The kvaldir are animals!$B$BThey made us fight the other prisoners. It would've been more merciful to just kill us all.$B$BThe youngling Karuk is still alive -- I noticed him arrive here. Tell him his father fought until the end.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Karuk about the Captured Tuskarr Prisoner.
QuestData.RewardText: I thank you, $n. You've shown a great deal of goodwill towards my clan.
